This is our second time booking the Redneck Riviera, definitely not our last! Our family it’s so very happy, we never want to leave. We are planing our third stay for next year! It feels like home away from home. I will share a list of the top ten things we absolutely love about the Redneck Riviera:
1. Fishing 🎣 large mouth bass, cat fish, sun fish, sicklets…
2. Location, close to Lake Okeechobee.
3. Nature, clear skies, lots of greens, pure air, birds, gators, turtles…Stars gazing, beautiful sky!
4. Ambiance, very very peaceful!
5. Amenities, pool, hot tub!
6. House is well equipped with appliances, air fryer, pots, washer/dryer and stocked with everything you need to cook.
7. Comfortable beds, all of them!
8. Lots of seating arrangements inside and outside.
9. Great neighbors! Quite, private and friendly.
10. Last but not lest, the host…amazing Tom! He is absolutely the best. He stays in contact throughout the stay and always on top of everything. So happy got to meet him in our last stay. Thank you Tom 🙏
